results.title: The Milky way = Dairy farming in Maffra
results.brief_description: This film showcases farming in the Maffra region and features six farmers who are leading the way in innovation and new farming technologies. Alan Clyne and his son Allister together with Robert White and John White are involved in the Herd Improvement initiative. Graeme Anderson and his son Ross are making the most of new irrigation techniques. Max Warren introduces his Robotic Dairy, the first ever to be used in Australia.
results.title_for_label: The Milky way = Dairy farming in Maffra
results.description: This film showcases farming in the Maffra region and features six farmers who are leading the way in innovation and new farming technologies. Alan Clyne and his son Allister together with Robert White and John White are involved in the Herd Improvement initiative. Graeme Anderson and his son Ross are making the most of new irrigation techniques. Max Warren introduces his Robotic Dairy, the first ever to be used in Australia.

results.title: 100 Years of Victorian women's right to vote
results.creator_credit: ACMI, Lisetta Moscardo and Helen Simondson
results.brief_description: Australian women have long been at the forefront of political change and civic reform. Over the decades, women have fought for their beliefs; the right to vote, professional advancement; and equality under the law. Watch the inspirational stories of eight women who were all first in their respective fields in this biographical documentary project. Produced by ACMI in partnership with the Victorian Government, through the Office of Women’s Policy Department of Planning and Community Development as part of the 2008 Celebration of the Centenary of Women’s Vote.
results.title_for_label: 100 Years of Victorian women’s right to vote

results.title: Suicide trail
results.creator_credit: Australian Road Safety Council and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: A dramatization in the style of a “western” of how fast driving on an unfamiliar road is as sure a method of suicide as shooting oneself.

results.title: Dead centre
results.brief_description: There are many kinds of centres: centres of dart boards, baby health centres, fathers who are the centres of their family. There is also the centre of the road: the drivers who stay on it are likely to end up in the dead centre - the Coroner’s Court.

results.title: Two nights
results.creator_credit: Rolmar Baldonado, Lisa Lloyd and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Over two nights, a young Chinese immigrant has sexual encounters with two very different individuals. Consequently, he has to choose between the one he wants or the one who wants him.
